name: The Pit (itch) (Dikkop)
description:
You and your buddies wake up after a long night of drinking.

Being wizards, you remember something about bragging to summon the greatest evil of all time: THE PIT! It turns out THE PIT cannot be unsummoned, just your luck.
There is one way to delay the evil though, by sacrificing anything to THE PIT!

Move with WASD
Pickup/Throw with Space Pick up objects and throw them in the pit! Try to survive longer than your buddies!
Watch out for angry villagers who don’t want you to sacrifice their babies!

This is a local multiplayer game but can be played alone (Keyboard + Controllers supported).
